üéôÔ∏è The latest episode of the SupplyChainBrain podcast is live, and you won't want to miss it! In this episode hosted by Robert Bowman, Editor-in-Chief of SupplyChainBrain, Rob Picken, SVP of Digital Transformation at Sourceability, dives deep into the critical topic of component #obsolescence. You'll learn about the challenges of managing component obsolescence as well as get insights into tools that help mitigate it. üéß Listen here: https://lnkd.in/d8FdgtvV and don't forget to share your thoughts afterwards in the comments üëá #Sourceability #Datalynq #electroniccomponents #mitigateobsolescence #supplychain

Today, we had the pleasure of welcoming Jackie Mattox, Founder, President, and CEO of Women in Electronics. Jackie's visit marks an important milestone for Women in Electronics' plans to expand their incredible mission throughout the EMEA region. We're thrilled to be a proud sponsor of Women in Electronics and support their dedication to empowering women in the electronics industry. Thank you, Jackie, for the inspiring conversation and insights you shared with us. ‚ù§Ô∏è #Sourceability #WomenInElectronics #womenempowerment #womenintech #electronicsindustry

In a recent poll, Sourceability surveyed customers to determine what they believe to be the biggest challenge impacting the industry today. Respondents chose between sustainability impacts (10%), workforce shortages (21%), regulatory and trade issues (28%), and supply chain disruptions (41%). The poll revealed that supply chain disruptions are the biggest challenge the electronic components market faces today. üîç Supply chain disruptions can have a massive impact on organizations, ranging from increased costs to the likelihood of obtaining counterfeit components. To avoid these problems, companies are encouraged to take proactive steps to mitigate or eliminate these challenges. ü§î Learn how here: https://hubs.li/Q02GHGc00 #Sourceability #electroniccomponents #supplychaindisruptions

üéÇ Happy 9th birthday, Sourceability! üéâ Nine years ago, a journey of passion, innovation, and desire to make a difference began. To our Sourceability family: your dedication, creativity, hard work, and commitment are vital in shaping our story, and we will always be grateful to each of you. To our customers, your trust and loyalty has always been an inspiration, pushing us to strive for excellence in part quality and client satisfaction. To our partners, thank you for your collaboration and support in our growth. We have achieved great things with your help, and we look forward to reaching new heights with you. Over these past nine years, we have evolved. We have opened ourselves to new opportunities, adapting over time to meet every challenge head on. As we reflect on our journey, we want to thank all of you for your encouragement during our challenges and triumphs. With gratitude, Sourceability ü©µ #Sourceability #companyanniversary #9years #thankyou

Artificial intelligence has revolutionized the way we think about technology, thanks to the components that make it all possible. üìà The rising success and interest in generative AI and large language models (LLMs) have pushed chipmakers to debut new AI products to try to capture a fraction of this ravenous demand. As new chips are announced, the market diversifies, giving all industries the option to find their perfect AI solution. üîçFind out more: https://hubs.li/Q02Fc7g-0 #Sourceability #Sourcengine #electroniccomponents #AI #technology
